name: Dega Madness
description: Play through 15 different heroes and use your abilities as you work towards the end of an orbiting platform without being destroyed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7(64-bit) Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphics card with at least 512 MB video ram and Shader Model 3.0 support. Storage: 100 MB available space
